description.para: Forwards the arguments to the constructor of the base class.

detaileddescription.para: InputIterator value type must be a model of the concept MeshPolyline_3.

memberdef.name: add_features_and_incidences

briefdescription.para: Add 1-dimensional features (curves) from the range [first, end) in the domain with their incidences with 2-dimensional features (patches) of the domain.

parameterdescription.para: is a model of ReadablePropertyMap with key type std::iterator_traits<InputIterator>::reference and a value type that is a model of MeshPolyline_3.
is a model of ReadablePropertyMap with key type std::iterator_traits<InputIterator>::reference and a value type that is a range of Surface_patch_index.
iterator to the first curve of the sequence
past-the-end iterator of the sequence of curves
the property map that provides access to the polyline, model of MeshPolyline_3, from the reference type of the iterator
the property map that provides access to the set of indices of the surface patches that are incident to a given 1D-feature (curve)

description.para: The following methods implement the requirement of the concept MeshDomainWithFeatures_3.

briefdescription.para: Returns an Index from a Curve_index
Returns a Curve_index from an Index
Returns an Index from a Corner_index
Returns a Corner_index from an Index
Returns Index associated to p (p must be the coordinates of a corner point)
The class Mesh_domain_with_polyline_features_3 is designed to allow the user to add some 0- and 1-dimensional features into any model of the MeshDomain_3 concept.

detaileddescription.para: The 1-dimensional features are described as polylines whose endpoints are the added corners.

parameterdescription.para: is the type of the domain which should be extended. It has to be a model of the MeshDomain_3 concept.
